attributes.additional_details: She going against what her people asked h. Wrong, wrong, wrong. She is NOT representing the people who put her forward to speak on thier behalf.
attributes.background: Anna Soubry is contiuing to follow her own Agenda by fighting to Remain in the EU. However her constituants strongly voted in favour of Brexit by a massive percentage.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked.
